What is the purpose of a Hedera Mirror Node?

A Hedera Mirror Node receives pre-constructed files from the Hedera Mainnet, including transaction records and account balance files. These files provide information about transactions and account balances on the network.

Where can the Hedera Mirror Node object storage bucket be found?

The Hedera Mirror Node object storage bucket can be found in either Google Cloud Platform (GCP) or an Amazon Web Services (AWS) bucket, and is configured for requester pays, meaning the mirror node operator is responsible for the operational costs of reading and retrieving data from the GCP/AWS.
